patents.patent_title: Lipid nanoparticle compositions for nucleic acid delivery
patents.patent_abstract: Compositions include ionizable lipids, helper lipids, PEG-lipids, and targeting moieties for liver-directed delivery.

patents.patent_title: Targeted mRNA formulations for metabolic disease
patents.patent_abstract: Disclosed are mRNA delivery particles with receptor-targeting ligands and controlled particle size.
